description: Shop online with your Avon Lady
overview: So go ahead, put your feet up and browse in my store today! If you have any questions or would like to place an order I am a phone call or an Email away! AVON’S Anti-aging Skin Care Featured On “THE VIEW” T.V. Show on ABC…!!! Now that’s hot — check it out today! Tiny Tillia, for infant and toddlers (0-4T). See the latest brochure by clicking on the ebrochure link/picture by scrolling down the left side of the site. Hello and thank you for choosing to shop my AVON ONLINE STORE. Did you know that you can purchase your favorite AVON Products online, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, with FREE DELIVERY for orders of $30 or more? So, browse my store at your leisure and know that I am always within reach—just a phone call or email away.
